properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued February 8 at 2:18AM PST until February 11 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest seas 15 to 18 feet at 15 seconds, becoming 13
to 16 feet at 11 seconds by tonight. Winds becoming north 20 to
25 kt Saturday afternoon.

* WHERE...Very steep and hazardous seas are expected beyond 6 nm
from shore and north of Cape Arago today. Very steep and
hazardous seas will spread to all areas Saturday evening.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, until 4 AM PST Tuesday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM PST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing will become especially
treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
